news_header: Germany reports first case of a new virus vaccine linked to a deadly disease from the Congo.
news_text: The National Infectious Disease Authority in Germany has announced the first case of a new virus vaccine, previously associated with a monkey vaccine. This virus, originating from the Democratic Republic of Congo, has a mortality rate exceeding 10% and has been spreading in the Congo and neighboring countries. Additionally, there is a vaccine case reported in Sweden. The World Health Organization (WHO) has declared a global health emergency due to low vaccination rates.
